newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korea's Daehan Flour seeks 23,000T of wheat.
newsitem.headline: S.Korea's Daehan Flour seeks 23,000T of wheat.

text.p: South Korea's Daehan Flour Mills Co Ltd has invited tenders to buy 13,000 tonnes of U.S. No.1 wheat by 2:00 p.m. (0500 GMT) on Friday, traders said on Thursday.
They said the company was also seen seeking 10,000 tonnes of Canadian wheat.

The official said the 13,000 tonnes of U.S. wheat would be split into three lots -- 8,000 tonnes of western white/soft white (ordinary), 3,000 tonnes of hard red winter (protein minimum 11.5 percent), and 2,000 tonnes of dark northern spring (protein minimum 14 percent).
Shipment was set for July 5-August 5 to the western port of Inchon.
The company was believed to be buying the Canadian wheat through a private negotiation with the Canadian Wheat Board.
